original_text: Then the Lord caused an evil spirit to control Saul. Saul was sitting in his house. He had a spear in his hand. David was making music with his harp.
korean_text: 사울이 손에 단창을 가지고 그의 집에 앉았을 때에 여호와께서 부리시는 악령이 사울에게 접하였으므로 다윗이 손으로 수금을 탈 때에

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord caused an evil spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때 주께서 악한 영을 일으켜

sentences.original_text: Saul was sitting in his house
He had a spear in his hand
